title: Outrageous Tipping Demands That Shocked Everyone (50 PICS) - Izismile.com
text:
1 2 "This Restaurant Covered Up The "No Tip" Option With A Sticker To Force Tipping"
3 "It's Getting Out Of Hand. Asked To Tip For An Online Purchase, When I Put $0, It Redirected Me To This"
4 Izismile Videos 5 "Amazon Sellers Asking For Tips"
6 7 "Airbnb Is Asking For Tips After Charging A Cleaning Fee"
8 Advertisement "Be Careful When Tipping At Pins Easton"
9 "Their 20% option was 60%, their 25% option was 74%, and their 35% option which was more than my bill as a whole was 104%.
After letting the manager know about this he didnâ€™t know why at first, but after investigation it seems their POS calculates the tip before any promotions or nightly specials. The night I went was a $2 fireball shot night, however they were calculating the tip for our bill as if the shots were $8 each.
I love pins, but this, their mandatory processing fee, and no allowance of cash is making it hard to justify buying drinks there regularly."
10 "Just In Case You Were Thinking Of Tipping Less... Think Again"
